title: Interpretation of losing a mobile phone in a dream as good and evil

preview.html: If you have had a dream about a mobile phone before, you can see in this article Interpretation of losing a mobile phone in a dream In detail, seeing a mobile phone is among the common visions in the world of dreams, because it is the device most used in daily life, whether for phone calls, browsing websites, or chatting With friends or taking pictures. But on the other hand, this vision is one of the mysterious visions that prompt dreamers to define its symbols in detail. Dream symbols either express something good or something bad for the dreamer, or reflect what is going on in the current period, so what? What is the interpretation of losing a mobile phone in a dream? We will learn this through an encyclopedia. Interpretation of losing a mobile phone in a dream. Jurists have indicated that if the dreamer sees that he is talking on the phone and cannot get what he hears from the caller, this is an indication of changes in the dreamer’s life, whether positive or negative. Dream interpretation scholars interpreted seeing the phone Mobile phones in general are a sign of the presence of close people in the dreamer’s life. If the dreamer sees that his phone has crashed in a dream, this reflects the anxiety and delusion that he is experiencing in reality. When the dreamer sees that the network is not connected to his mobile phone in a dream, this indicates that he He faces crises in reality. Seeing a mobile phone burning in a dream means that the dreamer will commit sins and violations in reality. Interpretation of seeing a mobile phone in a dream If the mobile phone falls from the dreamer in a dream, this indicates a secret that he hides from those around him that will be announced to those around him. If the dreamer sees That he is making a phone call with someone in reality and the sound is distorted, this reflects the state of tension and pressure that he is going through. When you hear a mobile phone ringtone in a dream, it means that happy news is coming to the dreamer. Dreaming of a phone exploding in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be tempted to Reality. Seeing a mobile phone in a dream for an unmarried young man symbolizes the approaching date of his wedding in reality. Interpretation of a dream about stealing a phone. Jurists interpreted seeing a stolen phone in a dream as one of the praiseworthy visions that heralds the dreamer a new job opportunity in reality. If the stolen phone is black in the dream This reflects the bad psychological state of the dreamer, but if it is white, this indicates that his situation has changed for the better. Seeing the dreamer stealing a mobile phone in a dream shows his bad ways in reality. When the dreamer dreamed that his phone was stolen and he was able to find it, this indicates relief from anxiety. And the anxiety stopped. One of the symbols of seeing a stolen mobile phone in a dream is that it indicates failure at work or loss of money, and God knows best. Lawyers pointed out that if the phone is stolen from the dreamer in a dream, if it has a secret number, then this is a sign of revealing a secret that he is hiding from whomever About it in reality. Interpretation of dreams about a man losing a mobile phone When the dreamer sees that he has lost his cell phone in a dream, this vision is one of the unpleasant visions that indicate that something bad has happened to him and it is a sign that it is a sword

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing my husband’s sister naked in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing my husband’s sister naked in a dream In case you want to know the interpretation of the dream about seeing my husband’s sister naked in a dream, it is one of the dreams that makes the dreamer feel very anxious, but he wants to know its explanation, so we will learn about its interpretation in the following lines, which are the interpretations of some hardworking scholars, The site administrators do not interfere in the interpretations, but rather convey the interpretations of scholars. Interpretation of the dream of seeing my husband’s sister naked in a dream. If a woman sees the nudity of her husband’s sister in a dream, this may indicate that she will be exposed to a very difficult situation during this period, and God knows best. The dream of seeing the nudity of her husband’s sister In a dream, it may indicate bad events that may occur during this period, and God knows best. Also, seeing your husband’s sister and seeing her private parts in a dream may be a sign of some problems and crises that one faces at that time, and God knows best. In the event that you see the nudity of your husband’s sister in a dream This may indicate financial problems that you may suffer from in the coming period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my husband’s sister stealing from me in a dream. In the event that you see your husband’s sister stealing from a woman in a dream, this could indicate the end of her worries and sorrows, thanks to God. My husband’s sister stole something from me. The woman is in a dream, which may indicate that she was going through a difficult time, and that she went through those days. Also, this vision could indicate the pressure and tension that the woman feels at that time, and God knows best. It is possible that this dream indicates new changes that may It occurs in the life of the person who had the vision, praise be to God. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my husband’s sister praying in a dream: In the case of dreaming about my husband’s brother who was praying, this may indicate the great love and tenderness that existed between them. Dreaming of my husband’s sister praying in a dream may indicate solidarity and the strength of the relationship between them during This time is by the grace of God. If a woman saw that her sister-in-law was praying, this may indicate that during this time she obtained a lot of money and great support, and God knows best. Perhaps seeing her sister-in-law praying in a dream indicates happy events that may come to them in that time. Days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my husband’s sister cooking in a dream: A dream about my husband’s sister cooking in a dream may indicate good changes that may occur in the life of the dreamer in the coming days. My husband’s sister was cooking in a dream, which may indicate the huge money and livelihood that she will gain in that Time. If a woman sees that her husband’s sister was cooking in a dream, this may indicate getting rid of the problems and difficulties that she was exposed to at that time. If a woman saw that her husband’s sister was cooking in a dream, this may indicate the strength of their relationship at that time. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a sister-in-law slaughtering her brother in a dream: If a woman sees her husband’s sister slaughtering her brother in a dream, this may indicate the abundance of money that the woman may obtain during this time. If a woman sees her husband’s sister slaughtering her brother in a dream, this may indicate That is until the tension and pressure that she was suffering from at that time ends, and God is Great. In the event that a woman sees that her husband’s sister is killing her husband

title: Interpretation of seeing a bat in a dream according to the great interpreters

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a bat in a dream: The bat or bat is considered one of the most terrifying animals for humans in general. If he sees him in a dream, he feels anxious and extremely afraid of the meaning of this vision and seeks to explain it, whether he sees himself killing the bat. Or if the bat was in his house or he saw a group of bats. Today and until today we will talk about the interpretation of seeing a bat in a dream and what its interpretations are and what is the interpretation of this dream according to the scholar Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a bat in a dream according to dream interpretation scholars: The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a bat in a dream according to He is a righteous person linked to his religion and worship, who performs prayers and abstains from the pleasures of this worldly life. As for the scholar Ibn Shaheen, he interpreted the bat in a dream as a sign of fear and terror, and it can also indicate oppression and injustice, and God knows best. As for Al-Nabulsi, he interpreted seeing the bat in a dream as It is a sign of safety and lack of fear, and it may indicate the news of pregnancy or childbirth, and it may indicate fear, and that the dreamer is far from his religion, and it may be a symptom of a long life for the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing a bat in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl dreams of a bat in a dream, then this It indicates her fear and distance from her religious matters. He also interpreted seeing a bat in a dream as evidence of a feeling of stability and security after being afraid of the dreaming girl. Also, seeing a bat in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that the dreaming girl is warned against deceiving enemies and warned against falling into... Harm. Interpretation of seeing a bat in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman dreams that she sees a bat in a dream, this is good news, and God knows best. Seeing a bat in a married woman’s dream means pregnancy soon. Also, seeing a bat in a dream can be a description of the woman who is dreaming. That she is corrupt and deals in magic. A bat in a dream is an unhealthy woman trying to harm people with magic and sorcery. Interpretation of seeing a bat in a dream for a pregnant woman: After providing the interpretation of seeing a bat in a dream for a single girl and a married woman, we will now discover what is the interpretation of seeing a bat in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing a bat in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that her due date is approaching, and God knows best. If a pregnant woman dreams that she sees a sleeping bat in a dream, this indicates the long life of that dreamer. Also, seeing a bat in a dream indicates that the sex of the fetus is male, and God knows best. Seeing a bat in a dream indicates the intelligence of a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman dreams of seeing a black bat in a dream, this indicates the presence of an enemy in this woman’s area who is trying to harm her, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a bat in a dream for a man: If a man dreams that he sees a bat in a dream This indicates that he is a hypocritical person who shows the opposite of what is hidden in his heart and that he deceives those around him. Also, seeing a bat in a man’s dream indicates a long life. A dream about a bat in a man’s dream can be interpreted as a pious person who is connected to his religion and prayers and does many good deeds. As for For Al-Nabulsi alone, he interpreted seeing a bat in a dream as a sign of stability and stability

title: What you don't know when you see someone you love at my house

preview.html: Many interpreters tell different interpretations of seeing someone we love inside the house, and this vision carries with it many different meanings and interpretations that can bring good or evil, and this difference is based on the circumstances of the vision and the nature of the owner. Who? Therefore, our Egyptian website provides a complete explanation of how to see someone you love in my house. Interpretation of a dream about someone you love in my houseWhen a married woman dreams of someone she loves other than her husband. This indicates that this woman had a lot of problems and disagreements between her and her husband during the period in which she saw this dream, which made her see this issue. But if the woman sees that in the dream there is someone she loves in general; This vision indicates that goodness and blessings will come to this woman in the very near future. If a woman sees in a dream that there is someone she loves in her house and that woman is divorced. This indicates this woman's desire to live with the person she loves. Whether this person is her ex-husband or someone else. On the other hand; Some imams of interpretation believe that if a married woman sees in her home someone she loves other than her husband, then she can do so. This dream carries evil and warns her that soon there will be serious harm in her life.But if the dreamer sees that he sees someone he loves in a dream. But this person ignores him. This indicates that the person in the dream has changed his feelings towards the dreamer and no longer desires him. Bin Shaheen also believes that seeing a dear person in a dream ignores the dreamer. This dream illustrates the many differences between the dreamer and his lover that may lead to separation and separation. Likewise, the neglect of the dreamer’s lover in the dream. This indicates that this lover abandoned the dreamer in the moments when he needed him most. Whoever sees in a dream that someone loves him. ignore him; This vision indicates that the dreamer will face major problems and crises in the coming period. If a young man sees in a dream that his beloved has returned to him after a long period of absence, this indicates his stability with his beloved in reality and the end of disputes and problems. If a single woman sees in a dream that a person The one she loves has returned after their separation. This indicates that she will be exposed to serious crises and problems that will burden her in her next life. However, if a married woman sees that her ex-lover has returned in a dream. This indicates that she does not feel safe in her husband's arms. And the instability of her life with him. But if a woman sees that she is hugging her husband? This is evidence of her absolute trust in him, her steadfastness with him, and her love for him. If an unmarried girl sees that she is hugging a young man in her dream and she knows this young man. This dream shows her love for him. And her strong desire to mingle and even marry him. A young man seeing in his dream that he is hugging a girl he loves. It is considered evidence of this young man's desire to associate with this girl and marry her. It also indicates the extent of his attachment to this girl and his love for reconciliation with her. Whoever sees in a dream that he is hugging a dead person, this dream indicates that this dreamer will be blessed by God with a long life in his earthly life. Interpretation of seeing someone you love at home

Whoever sees in a dream that someone loves him. ignore him; This vision indicates that the dreamer will face major problems and crises in the coming period. If a young man sees in a dream that his beloved has returned to him after a long period of absence, this indicates his stability with his beloved in reality and the end of disputes and problems. If a single woman sees in a dream that a person The one she loves has returned after their separation. This indicates that she will be exposed to serious crises and problems that will burden her in her next life. However, if a married woman sees that her ex-lover has returned in a dream. This indicates that she does not feel safe in her husband's arms. And the instability of her life with him. But if a woman sees that she is hugging her husband? This is evidence of her absolute trust in him, her steadfastness with him, and her love for him. If an unmarried girl sees that she is hugging a young man in her dream and she knows this young man. This dream shows her love for him. And her strong desire to mingle and even marry him. A young man seeing in his dream that he is hugging a girl he loves. It is considered evidence of this young man's desire to associate with this girl and marry her. It also indicates the extent of his attachment to this girl and his love for reconciliation with her. Whoever sees in a dream that he is hugging a dead person, this dream indicates that this dreamer will be blessed by God with a long life in his earthly life. title: Interpretation of a dream about blood coming from the head by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about blood coming out of the head could be a reference to multiple interpretations related to the dreamer’s life, and they are determined exactly according to what the dreamer says. A person may dream of blood coming out of his head due to a wound, or he may dream of a scalp from which blood is flowing, and there are those who dream of blood coming out of another person’s head.Interpretation of a dream of blood coming out of the headThe interpretation of a dream about blood coming out of the head can herald the patient’s salvation from the disease in The near future and he once again enjoys stability in life. A dream of blood coming out of his head may indicate a new beginning for the dreamer in life, and therefore he should be optimistic and work hard to improve his situation and feel more comfortable than before. Also, a dream of blood coming out of the front of the head could It is evidence of the dreamer’s efforts to get rid of the annoying things in his life, and here it is recommended to continue trying and pray to God Almighty for a peaceful life, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about blood coming out of the head by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream about blood coming out of the head according to the scholar Ibn Sirin could be an indicator There are some negative thoughts in the dreamer’s head, which he must try to get rid of as quickly as possible by thinking positively and remembering God Almighty, or the dream may be of blood bleeding from the head. The head is evidence of the necessity of paying attention to the religious aspect, getting closer to God Almighty in word and deed, and staying away from taboos. As for a dream of blood that bleeds for someone who is suffering from problems in his life, it can symbolize the immediate rejection of these problems. Only the dreamer should not hesitate to make an effort and continue the struggle. To reach stability, such as a dream of blood coming out of the head, can indicate the extent of ambitions that the dreamer wants to achieve, and therefore he must plan them well, work hard and diligently, and pray to God a lot for what he wants to happen, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of blood coming out of the head for a woman Single: Seeing blood flowing from the head in an unmarried girl’s dream may indicate bad thoughts that have surrounded her for a while, and that she should try to clear her mind of these thoughts so that the mind can rest and calm her or the dream. The blood that bleeds from the head may symbolize the visionary’s need to continue the struggle for salvation, and his problems with the ideal solutions that will make him return to stability again. The girl may dream of copious blood bleeding from her head, and here the dream of blood from her head indicates a feeling of failure and inability. On reaching success, here the dreamer should not give up and despair, but rather he should work again and ask. God Almighty’s help. As for in a dream, bad blood comes out of the head, as it can warn the dreamer that there is a person who is not good in her life, and that she should seek advice from God Almighty regarding her relationship with him. Before things get worse and suffering increases, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of blood coming from the head for a married woman: A married woman’s dream of bleeding from her head may be evidence that she is hiding some things from her husband and lying to him, and this is not good for her so she should stay away from him as quickly as possible and repent to God Almighty. almost

title: Interpretation of seeing children’s clothes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing children’s clothes through the vision of the website roy2a.com. Seeing children’s clothes and everything related to them gives souls a feeling of happiness and joy, and the love of these cute beings makes everything that belongs to them lovable and beautiful. Clothes in a dream have many meanings, and interpreters differed in the interpretation of seeing children’s clothes in a dream, according to the condition of these clothes and according to the condition and circumstances of the viewer, and whether he is single or a woman, married or pregnant. . Today, through the Ruya website, we will discuss in detail the interpretation of seeing children’s clothes in a dream, based on the opinion of major translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin seeing children’s clothes in a dream? Seeing children’s clothes in a dream It indicates many It is one of the good things that the dreamer will receive and indicates abundance of sustenance. Seeing the dreamer that someone gives him children’s clothes in a dream indicates that the news will reach the monarch, which will be a reason for his happiness. Seeing torn or dirty clothes in the dream indicates the problems that God will face and what he will face in the period Next. Watch also: Interpretation of seeing a dead person’s clothes in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing children’s clothes in a dream for a single woman: Seeing single clothes for children in a dream. It shows that good things are coming and that a lot of money is on their way. Seeing single clothes for children in a dream announces that he will soon marry someone who has good morals. Seeing in a dream an unmarried woman washing her children’s clothes shows that he will get rid of the crises and problems that he suffered because of him. Seeing women alone buying white clothes for children in a dream indicates success in her love life or the beginning of new feelings of love for this coming period. Seeing unmarried women in clothes A newborn baby in a dream says that he will face a problem, but he will succeed in overcoming it calmly and in good health. See also: Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing children’s clothes in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman’s clothes in a dream indicates that God will grant her the children she desires. Seeing a woman’s clothes A married woman in a dream indicates the excellence that the dreamer will achieve in her studies, work, and life in general. Seeing a dead married woman giving clothes to her child in a dream indicates that she will be pregnant soon, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman buying clothes for her child in a dream indicates that God will bless her with a son, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing a baby in a dream: Interpretation of seeing children’s clothes in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman in new, clean children’s clothes in a dream indicates a good pregnancy and an easy and safe birth. A pregnant woman seeing torn or dirty clothes in a dream indicates that she suffered from some problems during her pregnancy. Pregnancy or that she will face it during childbirth. Seeing a pregnant woman shopping for children’s clothes indicates that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. Seeing a pregnant woman buying children’s clothes for girls denotes that she will give birth to a girl, and God knows best. See also interpretation

title: Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream: My hair is falling out

preview.html: I dreamed that my hair was falling out. Hair is an appendage that appears on the human body and is considered one of the most important things that many seek to take care of because it gives the appearance a dignified and distinctive look. Especially for this vision, follow us. I dreamed that my hair was falling out. Interpreters see that the dreamer is observing hair loss in a dream, which means positive changes that will happen to him and getting rid of worries and problems. As for seeing a single man in a dream losing his hair, this is good news regarding the date of his marriage to a good girl, which is He loves her. An anxious person, if he sees in a dream that his hair is falling out a lot, it will give him almost good news of comfort and relief from sorrows and anxiety. Also, the dreamer who sees her hair falling out in a dream indicates that he will have happy news and the birth of one of the women he knows. If a man dreams that Eyebrow hair is falling out, this symbolizes that he is suffering from severe fatigue and illness and needs to take care of his health. Interpretation scholars confirm that seeing hair loss in a dream symbolizes the fulfillment of lasting promises with others. If the dreamer sees in a dream that his hair is falling out, it will give him good news about victory. Against enemies and regaining his stolen rights. I dreamed that my hair was falling out for the sake of Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin says that the dreamer who sees his hair falling out in a dream symbolizes his failure to take advantage of good opportunities in his life and his constant haste in making decisions. If the dreamer sees hair falling out in a dream From his head, this indicates the permanent fulfillment of promises he made with people. As for the dreamer who sees his curly hair falling out in a dream, this means that he will receive a lot of compensation and a lot of goodness. If the dreamer sees hair falling out from his armpit or chin in a dream, then he predicts The time for paying off his debts and obtaining a lot of money is approaching. Also, seeing a woman losing her hair profusely indicates great joy and the emergence of many good things in her life. If the dreamer sees himself bald without hair in a dream, this indicates serious fears and suffering from sadness and bad events. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he was plucking his hair, this symbolizes the financial loss that he will suffer in the near future. If the dreamer’s hair falls out in a dream for no reason, it indicates that he is seriously suffering from many worries and problems in life. Seeing the hair of a woman’s eyebrows falling out is an undesirable matter. Good because it indicates the loss of one of her loved ones or her illness. I dreamed that my hair was falling out. If an unmarried girl sees that her hair is falling out in a dream, this means that she will suffer from hardship, poor condition, and loss of money. If the dreamer sees in a dream her colored hair falling out, this indicates the fulfillment of desires. And aspirations and achieving goals. As for the dreamer who sees her vacancy in a dream, it shows the positive changes that will happen to her soon. If the dreamer sees in a dream her hair falling to the ground, this symbolizes her loss of opportunities and her inability to continue success. If the dreamer sees in a dream her hair falling out and becomes sad Accordingly, she considers it as S

title: Interpretation of driving a car in a dream

preview.html: The vision also differs for a man and a young man and varies according to the condition of the viewer, and in the following lines for our website gptafser.com/ we will talk about seeing a car in a dream and its interpretation.. Interpretation of seeing riding a car in a dream for a single girl: seeing a single girl in her sleep waiting for the car. In the vision is a message to the girl that she will soon receive Something beautiful, like hearing news that she is waiting. The unmarried girl saw the bus while she was sleeping and got on it and enjoyed the trip she spent in the car. If the vision has an indication for the girl, I will make a decision in her favor. Her condition will soon improve because of this decision, and God knows best. Seeing the car waiting in a dream for an unmarried girl She is married and was waiting for him and showing signs of happiness and joy. The vision indicates that goodness will come to her soon. And if the car is waiting, she is frowning and sad, and showing signs of anxiety. The vision indicates that the dreamer will receive very sad news that will make her face frown, and God knows best. Seeing the woman alone in a dream on the bus during... Waiting for her. The vision indicates that there is good news that she will receive soon, God willing. The vision can indicate that the dreamer is waiting for a happy occasion for her, her family, or those around her. Seeing the only girl entering the bus and all the passengers she knows. Interpretation of seeing an unmarried girl having a party or An occasion that brings together the entire family, relatives and loved ones soon, God willing. Upon seeing the only girl getting into the car, and after getting up and entering, she found herself frowning and sad. The vision shows that the girl has made a wrong decision and will regret it, and God knows best. It also indicates that the visionary is exposed to problems and obstacles that are worrying her life. When seeing the only girl riding the bus, she had signs of happiness and joy. This is evidence that her life will change for the better. Perhaps the vision indicates an unmarried girl’s connection to a person who she has wished for all her life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a car by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing riding a car in a dream. For a married woman: Seeing a married woman dreams that she is inside a bus, and she feels dizzy, tired, and exhausted. The vision is an indication of an unpleasant vision for the pioneer. It indicates that the dreamer will face major problems that will hinder her path in life in the coming period, and God and His Messenger know best. Seeing a married woman in her dream that she is waiting for the car The vision carries an indication of the need to make decisions in her life in general. If she sees that she is getting into the car and she sees in her dream that the car driver is driving the car quickly. The vision indicates that the dreamer is listening to the words of those who want to harm her and hurt her, and God knows best. I saw her in a dream. She is entering the bus and her husband is with her. The vision shows that she is stable with her husband and that she is living a happy family life. There are no problems and the visionary is enjoying a peaceful life full of love. If a married woman saw the car in a dream and it was full of passengers. The vision in it indicates the size of the large number of families, relatives and loved ones. Those surrounding the visions. The vision also shows that the dreamer has many relationships with the people around her and that she is a social person. Interpretation of R’s vision

And if the car is waiting, she is frowning and sad, and showing signs of anxiety. The vision indicates that the dreamer will receive very sad news that will make her face frown, and God knows best. Seeing the woman alone in a dream on the bus during... Waiting for her. The vision indicates that there is good news that she will receive soon, God willing. The vision can indicate that the dreamer is waiting for a happy occasion for her, her family, or those around her. Seeing the only girl entering the bus and all the passengers she knows. Interpretation of seeing an unmarried girl having a party or An occasion that brings together the entire family, relatives and loved ones soon, God willing. Upon seeing the only girl getting into the car, and after getting up and entering, she found herself frowning and sad. The vision shows that the girl has made a wrong decision and will regret it, and God knows best. It also indicates that the visionary is exposed to problems and obstacles that are worrying her life. When seeing the only girl riding the bus, she had signs of happiness and joy. This is evidence that her life will change for the better. Perhaps the vision indicates an unmarried girl’s connection to a person who she has wished for all her life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a car by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing riding a car in a dream. For a married woman: Seeing a married woman dreams that she is inside a bus, and she feels dizzy, tired, and exhausted. The vision is an indication of an unpleasant vision for the pioneer. It indicates that the dreamer will face major problems that will hinder her path in life in the coming period, and God and His Messenger know best. Seeing a married woman in her dream that she is waiting for the car The vision carries an indication of the need to make decisions in her life in general. If she sees that she is getting into the car and she sees in her dream that the car driver is driving the car quickly. The vision indicates that the dreamer is listening to the words of those who want to harm her and hurt her, and God knows best. I saw her in a dream. She is entering the bus and her husband is with her. The vision shows that she is stable with her husband and that she is living a happy family life. There are no problems and the visionary is enjoying a peaceful life full of love. If a married woman saw the car in a dream and it was full of passengers. The vision in it indicates the size of the large number of families, relatives and loved ones. Those surrounding the visions. The vision also shows that the dreamer has many relationships with the people around her and that she is a social person. Interpretation of R’s vision
